title: It's a shame I had to move to LAN servers to enjoy League again
body: Having a 130 ping on the NA servers with a shit ton of packet losses made my League experience horrible. Did some research and learned that the LAN servers were located in my home town (FL) and decided to make the switch. Now I average around 25 ping and the game is so much more smooth. It's easier to last hit, orb walk, use skill shots, dodge. Everything is just so much better.
